name: Sweetland
description:
PLEASE LOWER THE VOLUME A BIT! THE VOICE ACTING CAN GET A BIT LOUD.

PLEASE WAIT TILL THE VOICE ACTING IS OVER! DON'T PUSH NEXT( Z KEY) OR ELSE THE VOICE DIALOG WILL OVERLAP EACH OTHER AND YOUR EAR WILL BE PUNISHED!

I AM AWARE OF THIS CARD GLITCH THAT AN AMMO CARD  WILL DISAPPEAR, JUST REDRAW AGAIN AND ANOTHER CARD WILL COME UP

Voice actors made from: elevenlabs.io 

( yes that's right, i used a AI to help with the voice casting!) 

Music by Marllon Silva (xDeviruchi). 

move WASD or ARROW KEYS

Battle:

SPACE to draw cards

Tab to get rid of cards ( it does this one at a time) so you would need to press 3 times before you can redraw again.

each card above has a key Input, press that key to highlight that card, press it again to use the card, if its an attack card, the ammo card will load up your ammo count, located right below your health.

aim with mouse when bullets are loaded and fire with LMB, don't forget to aim!

other cards effects will automatically be used, once highlighted.

YOU CANNOT DIE! I MADE IT LIKE THAT CAUSE GAMEPLAY ISN'T MANDATORY, AND PLUS I WANTED TO SEE HOW THIS GAMEPLAY FEELS ANYWAYS. FEEDBACK PLEASE AND THANKS
